title: My account got hacked and permabanned, what should I do?
body: A week ago I was sent an email saying my account had been permabanned due to the use of scripts and other malicious software turns out that someone managed to hack my account and started scripting. I have sent a support ticket trying to appeal the ban but I was wondering if there is anything else I can do to help my case as I haven't been able to find much on the subject.  Any suggestions to prove that my account was hacked would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/YQ4IrvNq-morality-poll

Have some votes and join the club, but make no mistake, this silly issue really should be addressed!

Got the same problem, latest reply I got from support seems like they're implying it's OUR fault for not keeping our details safe.
Best of luck to us, it's not looking good.

There are other posts here with the same problem, Riot's f-ing up with their ability to keep accounts secure and doesn't seem they care much at all.

Yeah I sent a support ticket and they just said "I hope you can see why it would be unsatisfying and frustrating to play against other players who are using a tool to tamper with the gameplay experience." which really doesn't help me at all, it feels like I'm talking to a brick wall rather than an actual person. Best of luck to you too my friend.

Hey there,

Your best bet in this case would be to follow up with Player Support to see if anything can be done.

We here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
